title: Larger Than Life
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1.5 Bath, approximately 1263 Sq.

Located in the coveted Uptown State Thomas Neighborhood of Dallas, Texas, Manchester State Thomas offers something for everyone: spacious Townhouses, historic architecture of the Brownstones, and the contemporary style of the City View Flats.
These luxury apartments in Uptown Dallas give you the elegant and refined lifestyle you desire.
Experience the State Thomas neighborhood's fusion of modern convenience with the old-world charm of the vibrant, walkable, and pet-friendly apartments in Uptown Dallas.
We love your four legged friends!
2 pets per apartment home, no weight restrictions.
